title: We are customer obsessed
content: Our customers are at the heart of everything we do – no two are alike. We walk in their shoes to drive decisions.

title: We build trust
content: We actively listen, we’re straightforward, and we treat our teams and colleagues with respect.

title: We think big
content: We imagine what’s seemingly impossible, not what’s been done before. We’re changing the way people eat and more.

title: We celebrate difference
content: Diverse perspectives drive better outcomes for both Deliveroo and our customers. We value all contributions.

title: We get to the bottom of things
content: We get to the root cause of an issue as quickly as we can using intuition and data to develop our solutions.

title: We succeed as a team
content: We demonstrate respect and practice empathy to drive our people and our teams closer together.

title: We’re relentless
content: There will be lots of unfamiliar obstacles. We either knock them down or figure out a way to get around them.

title: We deliver results
content: We take ownership for the tasks at hand and deliver high quality. We’re accountable and follow through.

title: We simplify
content: We simplify our explanations, processes, and approach. We frame issues for those who don’t have context.

title: We embrace change
content: We plan for the long term and short term, and adapt where needed. The road is full of twists and turns.

title: We’re frugal
content: We spend wisely. We prioritise carefully and spend the company’s resources, time and money efficiently.

title: We never say “it’s not my job”
content: We’re shopkeepers. We have ownership over our own things, but we do what we can to run the best shop in town.
